Material used.Description: Comparison of patient fibroblasts with normal fibroblasts.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced respiratory activity and respiratory control ratio in patient fibroblasts. Increased reliance on glycolysis for ATP production.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Normal fibroblasts used as positive controls.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal respiratory activity and control ratio (standard mitochondrial function).

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significantly reduced respiratory activity and control ratio (standard mitochondrial dysfunction).

Material used.Description: Quantification of oxidative phosphorylation complex quantity and activity.

Readout description.Result Description: No significant differences in complex quantity, but reduced activity in patient fibroblasts.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal complex activity levels (standard mitochondrial function).

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significantly reduced complex activity (standard mitochondrial dysfunction).
